sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:

Table content:
Hardware | PCI/USB ID | Working?
GPU |  | Yes
Touchscreen |  | Yes
Wireless |  | Yes
Audio |  | Yes
Touchpad |  | Yes
Camera |  | Partial
Bluetooth |  | Yes
MicroSD Reader |  | Yes
Accelerometer |  | Untested
Luxsensor |  | Yes
Gyroscope |  | Yes

The Acer Switch Alpha 12 is a two 2 in 1 Tablet PC device, equipped with a 12 inch 2160 x 1440 display. This page was written using the SA5-271-38U0 version with an i3-6100 CPU and 4GB of RAM.

sections.title: Installation
sections.content:
Disable Secure Boot, which requires you to set a Supervisor Password. Optionally, enable the "F12 Boot Menu". To go into the UEFI, press "Volume Up" while powering up the device.

The remaining part of the installation should be the same as on every other x86 System.

sections.title: Camera
sections.content: Camera on the back is not detected as of May 2018.

sections.title: Power Management
sections.content: tlp is working fine. You may want to exclude the detachable keyboard from USB auto-suspend, otherwise it misbehaves.

sections.title: Sensors
sections.content: Luxsensor and Gyroscope are working well with iio-sensor-proxy installed.
